tooltip.item.gadget_lab.rebreather: Allows you to swim faster and breath underwater for 5 minutes
tooltip.item.gadget_lab.enigmatic_hold: Holds up-to 10 mobs and places them in the same order they were captured in
tooltip.item.gadget_lab.gravity_boots: Jump higher and removes fall damage
tooltip.item.gadget_lab.fortune_amulet: Gives fortune when in the players inventory
tooltip.item.gadget_lab.teleportation_wa: Teleports 32 blocks in the direction the player is looking, if there is a block between the player and the look spot it teleports just infront or on top
tooltip.item.gadget_lab.pocket_watch: Adds a hud with the game time
tooltip.item.gadget_lab.climbing_gloves: Allows you to climb 3 blocks high
tooltip.item.gadget_lab.smoke_bombs: Spawns a large area of smoke particles
tooltip.item.gadget_lab.herbicide_spray: Clears out all flora ontop of grass
tooltip.item.gadget_lab.blaze_blaster: Shoots blaze powder and creates fires
tooltip.block.gadget_lab.energy_transmit: Wirelessly power machines in a small radius at the cost of power
tooltip.block.gadget_lab.growth_accelera: Speeds up crop growth in a small radius
tooltip.block.gadget_lab.block_breaker: Breaks blocks on the breaking face of the block breaker
tooltip.block.gadget_lab.cloud_platform: You can place this block mid air allowing you to create platforms while flying
tooltip.block.gadget_lab.ore_extractor: Mines ores directly below. Outputs above
tooltip.block.gadget_lab.carbon_compress: Turns various carbon items into diamonds
tooltip.block.gadget_lab.displacement_pa: Teleports you to a predefined location
tooltip.block.gadget_lab.holographic_pro: Renders an entity above the block. Set via enigmatic hold
enchantment.gadget_lab.magma_walker.desc: The Magma Walker enchantment temporarily freezes the lava around you and turns it into obsidian
